description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 2, 3} mod 6.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 200], Mod[#, 6] == 0 || Mod[#, 6] == 2 || Mod[#, 6] == 3 &] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 07 2011 *)Select[Range[0, 200], MemberQ[{0, 2, 3}, Mod[#, 6]] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 02 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = my(m = n % 6); (m==0) || (m==2) || (m==3); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 02 2015(MAGMA) [n : n in [0..130] | n mod 6 in [0,2,3]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 02 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
